Articles.Content:
I have a "dream"...

I want,like a wish,to the KSP 1.0,SQUAD Team coperate with alexustas,and add,instruments,made it from him to stock spacecrafts!

[http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/54925-WIP-ALCOR-Advanced-Landing-Capsule-for-Orbital-Rendezvous-by-ASET-%28UPD-30-06-2014%29/page138](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/54925-WIP-ALCOR-Advanced-Landing-Capsule-for-Orbital-Rendezvous-by-ASET-%28UPD-30-06-2014%29/page138)

#1379 post

[http://imgur.com/a//flWLh#0](http://imgur.com/a//flWLh#0)
It would be nice, Squad have collaborated with modders before.

There are some new IVAs coming for 1.0, you can see them here: [http://imgur.com/a/Z5liB#0](http://imgur.com/a/Z5liB#0)

I'm not sure we'll ever see RPM-style multi-function displays in the stock game, those certainly look great, though.

Sorry about my English,and sorry,because i "put" this thread to the wrong place ("Wellcome Aboard") of Forum.

I see these nice new IVA from SQUAD,but i wish to refresh all stock IVA with the JSI and alexusta's monitors and instruments,i understand,that is,maybe is not to the philosophy of the KSP Game,but i feel tell what i want,to the KSP 1.0!

I know,there are serious reasons,if what i want,never can happened...i start "play" with KSP from January 2012,and i love it like how be now.

Thanks a lot SQUAD Team for this Game,because give the chance to spend a lot of hours,with ENTERTAINMENT,and learn about rocket science,and physics!

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-06T13:17:30Z" title="04/06/2015 01:17  PM" data-short="9 yr">April 6, 2015</time> by CERVERUS**
RPM and a stock option for 1st person EVA would really make my day.
i-i-i-i-is t-t-t-that tt-the iva for the mk3 and mk 1 inline cockpit? OMG

> 
> i-i-i-i-is t-t-t-that tt-the iva for the mk3 and mk 1 inline cockpit? OMG

Yup! I had the same seizure when I first saw them! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
